General.Name: Morrow Bank ASA
General.Description: Morrow Bank ASA provides unsecured financing to private individuals in the Norwegian, Finland, Sweden, and German markets. It offers deposit products, consumer loans, credit cards, and point of sale finance products. The company was formerly known as Komplett Bank ASA and changed its name to Morrow Bank ASA in April 2023. Morrow Bank ASA was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Lysaker, Norway.

1.Name: Ms. Jonna  Kyllonen
1.Title: Operations Mang. for Customer Service & Employee Director
